summary: Complete testing of TaskAct project management refactor. All features working correctly: Projects page loads with Projects (11) and Templates (7) tabs, New Project/Template buttons visible for partner, modals display all required fields with populated dropdowns (clients, categories, users), project creation with tasks works, project details show tasks correctly.
critical_code_review_comments: Projects.js correctly fetches clients and categories via useEffect for dropdown population
Project creation API correctly creates real tasks in tasks collection with project_id reference
Template API properly handles scope (tenant vs global) permissions
Project deletion cascades to delete associated tasks - confirmed via API test
Project details modal correctly displays tasks with assignee names
seed_data_creation: Test projects and templates created and cleaned up during testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: Project management refactor fully tested. Key verified features: 1) Projects page loads with tabs showing correct counts, 2) New Project modal has all fields (name, description, client dropdown with 37 options, category dropdown with 17 options, due date, template selector, tasks section with assignee dropdown), 3) New Template modal has template name, description, category/client dropdowns, task blueprints section, 4) Project details modal shows tasks with status and assignee, 5) Client and category dropdowns populated from /api/clients and /api/categories endpoints, 6) Backend properly handles project CRUD with tasks in main collection

login_as_partner.details: Logged in with SCO1, bhavika@sundesha.in, password123

projects_page_loads.details: Projects page loads with Projects (11) and Templates (7) tabs visible

new_project_button_visible.details: data-testid='create-project-btn' found and clickable for partner

new_template_button_visible.details: data-testid='create-template-btn' found and clickable for partner

new_project_modal_fields.details: Modal shows: Project Name*, Description, Client dropdown (37 options), Category dropdown (17 options), Due Date*, Template selector, Tasks section with task title and Assign to dropdown

templates_tab_shows_templates.details: Templates tab shows 7 templates with name, description, task count, and 'Use Template' button

new_template_modal_opens.details: Modal shows: Template Name*, Description, Default Category dropdown, Default Client dropdown, Task Blueprints section

project_details_show_tasks.details: Project details modal shows: Client, Category, Due Date, Progress (0/2 tasks 0%), Tasks list with title and assignee name

test_details: test_02_get_projects_list - PASSED (returned 11+ projects with total_tasks, completed_tasks, progress)
test_03_get_templates_list - PASSED (returned 7 templates with can_edit, can_delete permissions)
test_06_create_project_with_tasks - PASSED (created project, verified tasks have project_id)
test_07_get_project_details - PASSED (project details include tasks array)
test_08_create_template - PASSED (created tenant-scope template with task blueprints)

tests_run: Verify Projects and Templates tabs with counts
Verify New Project and New Template buttons
Open New Project modal - verify all fields
Click Templates tab - verify templates listed
Open New Template modal - verify fields
View project details - verify tasks shown
